dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 0015344-250914085247600
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is one of (Procambarus clarkii, Procambarus virginalis, Procambarus acutus, Faxonius limosus, Pacifastacus leniusculus, Faxonius virilis, Faxonius immunis, Faxonius juvenilis, Faxonius rusticus, Pontastacus leptodactylus)", "Country is one of (Belgium)", "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "Year is greater than or equal to 2000", "OccurrenceStatus is Present" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 197 records from Invasive species - American bullfrog (Lithobates catesbeianus) in Flanders, Belgium 74 records from VIS - Non-native fish in Flanders, Belgium 910 records from DEMNA-DNE : Exotic animal occurrences in Wallonia, Belgium 1 records from NABU|naturgucker 48 records from Monitoring of fishes and crustaceans by Province East Flanders in Flanders, Belgium 5 records from Diveboard - Scuba diving citizen science observations 164 records from Programme CROMIS: carnet de plongée en ligne de la FFESSM-Observations d'espèces subaquatiques collectées par les utilisateurs de CROMIS 2 records from Contrat de Rivière - RIPARIAS: detection and management of aquatic invasive alien species 190 records from VIS - Fishes in inland waters in Flanders, Belgium 13 records from Collections and observation data National Museum of Natural History Luxembourg 228 records from Contrats de Rivière IAS surveillance: monitoring of aquatic and riparian invasive alien species in Wallonia, 2023-2024 25 records from data.mnhn.lu observation data 11 records from VIS - Fishes in estuarine waters in Flanders, Belgium 57 records from VIS - Specific reference freshwater monitoring in Flanders, Belgium (post 2013) 11 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 3552 records from Waarnemingen.be - Non-native animal occurrences in Flanders and the Brussels Capital Region, Belgium 206 records from Alien macroinvertebrates in Flanders, Belgium 1374 records from Observations.be - Non-native species occurrences in Wallonia, Belgium 9 records from RATO - daily operations commissioned by the province East Flanders, Belgium 10 records from INSDC Sequences 2 records from Water Framework Directive AGE, Recorder-Lux database 3 records from RBINS Crustacea collection 1 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 46 records from Programme BioObs: observations naturalistes en milieux aquatiques-Observations de BioObs. 211 records from DEMNA-DNE : Occurrences of benthic macroinvertebrates in running waters of Wallonia, Belgium 2 records from Dutch Foundation for Applied Water Research (STOWA) - Limnodata Neerlandica 35 records from Monitoring of invasive alien crayfishes in the Flemish part of the LIFE RIPARIAS areas 173 records from VIS - Reference freshwater monitoring in Flanders, Belgium (post 2013) 270 records from DEMNA-DNE : Early warning system on Introduced Species in Wallonia 54 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 10 records from VIS - Estuarine monitoring in Flanders, Belgium (post 2013)
